Research
Research Areas
  • Recommender Systems
  • Ranking Evaluation
  • Information Retrieval

Participation in Research Projects
  • Proyect name: Mas allá de la recomendación estática: equidad, interacción y transparencia
  • Dates: July 2020 - May 2023
  • Funding: Public
  • Location: Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
  • Role: Researcher
  • Tasks: Participation in the project while finishing the thesis and in the postdoctoral phase defining new mechanisms to measure fairness in the recommendations and partially mitigate the possible injustices and biases that may exist in them.


  • Proyect name: Recomendación en Medios Sociales: Contexto, Diversidad y Sesgo Algorítmico
  • Dates: July 2017 - December 2019
  • Funding: Public
  • Location: Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
  • Role: Predoctoral Researcher
  • Tasks: Participation in the project while conducting my PhD analyzing biases in recommender systems and defining new mechanisms to incorporate temporal and sequential influence in the recommendations.


  • Proyect name: MyStreetBook
  • Dates: March 2017 - July 2017
  • Funding: Private
  • Location: Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
  • Role: Collaborator
  • Tasks: Algorithm design to generate personalized tourist routes for users of the MyStreetBook application.

Attendance and Papers Presentation at Conferences
  • Attendee and lecturer in ACM Conference on Recommender Systems (RecSys 2019). 16 - 20 September 2019, Copenhague, Denmark
  • Attendee and lecturer in ACM Conference on Recommender Systems (RecSys 2018). 2 - 7 October 2018, Vancouver, Canada
  • Attendee and lecturer in Spanish Conference on Information Retrieval (CERI 2018). 25 - 27 June 2018, Zaragoza, Spain
  • Attendee and lecturer in European Conference on Information Retrieval (ECIR 2018). 26 - 29 Mars 2018, Grenoble, France
